x-sap-shortText: Manage list items in your configured SAP Concur lists.

info.title: List Items
info.description: Provides an automated solution to clients who would like to manage list items. This API provides methods to view, add, update or delete list items owned by the specified lists. This API supports Concur Expense, Concur Invoice, and Concur Request.

OAuth2.description: To use this API, you need to get OAuth client credentials (client ID, secret, and geolocation) from SAP Concur, and be authorized to use the relevant scope. Refer to the full authentication information for more information.

get.description: Returns all list items based on the search criteria.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. The default is 25 and the maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The start of the page offset. The default is from the beginning.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list this item is a member of.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the list item. Maximum length: 64.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of this item's parent. Empty when there is no parent.

parameters.name: level1Code
parameters.description: The item code for the first level of the list. All lists have at least a Level1Code. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level2Code
parameters.description: The item code for the second level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level3Code
parameters.description: The item code for the third level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level4Code
parameters.description: The item code for the fourth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level5Code
parameters.description: The item code for the fifth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level6Code
parameters.description: The item code for the sixth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level7Code
parameters.description: The item code for the seventh level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level8Code
parameters.description: The item code for the eighth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level9Code
parameters.description: The item code for the ninth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

parameters.name: level10Code
parameters.description: The item code for the tenth level of the list. Empty when this level doesn't exist in the list. Maximum 32 characters

post.description: Creates a new item in the specified list.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: List item object to create.

get.summary: Get a single list item by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list item.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list this item is a member.

put.description: Updates the specified list item. Only the provided fields will be updated, missing fields will not be altered.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list item.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The list item object to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list item to delete

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the list associated with a list item to be deleted
